description_for_human: Official community PumpFun SDK for creating, buying, and selling tokens on the Solana blockchain. Bonding curve pricing, AMM migration, tiered fees, creator fee sharing, token incentives, and vanity address generation.
description_for_model: Pump SDK (@pump-fun/pump-sdk) â€” TypeScript SDK for the Pump protocol on Solana. Offline-first instruction builders (PumpSdk/PUMP_SDK singleton) and online SDK (OnlinePumpSdk) for token creation, bonding curve trading, AMM migration, fee sharing, and token incentives across Pump, PumpAMM, and PumpFees programs. Also includes Rust vanity address generator (100K+ keys/sec), TypeScript vanity generator, MCP server for AI agents, and production Bash scripts. All crypto uses only official Solana Labs libraries.
